name: Out Of My Way!
description:
Hey! This is Cross Chris! Chris really hates crowds, and while he does his best to keep his cool he is chronically crabby and can't keep himself from creating a considerable kerfuffle. Keep him on the correct course to keep his crotchety character in check!

Transcendent Games
